articles.title: US Covid-19 deaths: December is the deadliest month since the pandemic began -- and projections for January are 'nightmarish' - msnNOW
articles.description: December has been the nation's deadliest month since the Covid-19 pandemic's start -- with more than 63,000 Americans lost to the virus in the past 26 days.
articles.content:
